item.title: CLIPCEIL: Domain Generalization through CLIP via Channel rEfinement and Image-text aLignment
item.description: CLIPCEIL enhances CLIP’s domain generalization by refining feature channels for domain invariance and aligning image-text embeddings, achieving state-of-the-art performance.
